conbody.note: The content of this section is only relevant for NCC-VNF.

section.p: Edit the file /opt/cdr/CDREnvVars and update the appropriate lines to enable CDR file writing and change the number of threads for multi-threading.

note.p: Ensure that the line you update is un-commented (# is removed), for the changes to take effect.

p.b: Enable/disable multi-threading in CDR file writing

sectiondiv.p: By default, multi-threading is disabled for CDR file writing.

ul.li:
To enable multi-threading, update the line as follows:
export CDR_MULTI_PATH=YES

To disable multi-threading, update the line as follows:
export CDR_MULTI_PATH=NO
